oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A moral guide for the student, concerning respect for the teacher and moral behaviour in general. A few sentences begin with 'O, child'. Alternately black and red ink was used to write this guide. The text is framed by two lines in red ink. On the top-left corner of the page appears the page number: 39. The bottom-right corner of the page is torn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Moral guide for the student
